com.totsp.gwittir.client.util
Class ToStringBean

java.lang.Object
  com.totsp.gwittir.client.util.ToStringBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ToStringBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Bean to introspect properties and provide toString() in GWT environ. Inspired by the Rome bean utils - https://rome.dev.java.net/source/browse/rome/src/java/com/sun/syndication/feed/impl/. Powered by the gwittir Introspection API. Example: public String toString() { ToStringBean b = new ToStringBean(this); return b.toString(); } public boolean equals(Object obj) { EqualsHashCodeBean b = new EqualsHashCodeBean(this); return b.equals(obj); }

Author:
ccollins
See Also:
com.totsp.gwittir.client.beans.AbstractModelBean, Serialized Form
